content:
The navigation for your Fitclass website should include the following main sections:

1. Home: This should be the landing page for your website, with a clear call-to-action to sign up or log in.
2. Classes: This section should allow users to browse and search for classes by category, instructor, and schedule. Users should also be able to filter classes by difficulty level, duration, and equipment needed.
3. Trainers: This section should allow users to view profiles of trainers, read reviews, and see upcoming class schedules. Users should also be able to search for trainers by name, location, and class type.
4. Schedule: This section should allow users to view upcoming class schedules, book classes, and cancel reservations. Users should also be able to view their own class history and upcoming reservations.
5. Tips: This section should allow users to view their own tip history, and see how much tip they have received.
6. About Us: This section should provide information about the company, mission, and team behind Fitclass.com.
7. FAQ: This section should answer common questions about the platform, such as how to book a class, how to cancel a reservation, and how the tip system works.
8. Contact Us: This section should provide users with a contact form and contact information for customer support.
9. Login/Signup: This section should allow users to log in or sign up for an account.
10. Profile: This section should allow users to view and edit their account information, view their class history and upcoming reservations, and manage their payment information.
